allow: Bash(for file in pages/admin.tsx pages/calendar.tsx pages/onboarding.tsx pages/songs.tsx components/add-song-modal.tsx components/gig-alert-banner.tsx components/side-nav.tsx)
Bash(for file in songs.tsx onboarding.tsx calendar.tsx admin.tsx profile.tsx dashboard.tsx)
Bash(do sed -i "s/import { useCognitoAuth } from ""@\/hooks\/useCognitoAuth"";/import { useServerAuth } from ""@\/hooks\/useServerAuth"";/g; s/useCognitoAuth/useServerAuth/g" "$file")
